verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after this, that the king of the children of Ammon died, and Hanun his son reigned in his stead.
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass after this, that the king of the children of Ammon died, and Hanun his son reigned in his stead.

tokens.text: And it came to pass after this

verses.text_plain: Then said David, I will shew kindness unto Hanun the son of Nahash, as his father shewed kindness unto me. And David sent to comfort him by the hand of his servants for his father. And David’s servants came into the land of the children of Ammon.
verses.verse_html: 2Then said David, I will shew kindness unto Hanun the son of Nahash, as his father shewed kindness unto me. And David sent to comfort him by the hand of his servants for his father. And David’s servants came into the land of the children of Ammon.

verses.text_plain: And the princes of the children of Ammon said unto Hanun their lord, Thinkest thou that David doth honour thy father, that he hath sent comforters unto thee? hath not David rather sent his servants unto thee, to search the city, and to spy it out, and to overthrow it?
verses.verse_html:
3And the princes of the children of Ammon said unto Hanun their lord, Thinkest thou that David doth honour thy father, that he hath sent comforters unto thee? hath not David rather sent his servants unto thee, to search the city, and to spy it out, and to overthrow it? ▼
▼ Thinkest…: Heb. In thine eyes doth David

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Thinkest…: Heb. In thine eyes doth David
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Thinkest…: Heb. In thine eyes doth David

verses.text_plain: Wherefore Hanun took David’s servants, and shaved off the one half of their beards, and cut off their garments in the middle, even to their buttocks, and sent them away.
verses.verse_html: 4Wherefore Hanun took David’s servants, and shaved off the one half of their beards, and cut off their garments in the middle, even to their buttocks, and sent them away.

verses.text_plain: When they told it unto David, he sent to meet them, because the men were greatly ashamed: and the king said, Tarry at Jericho until your beards be grown, and then return.
verses.verse_html: 5When they told it unto David, he sent to meet them, because the men were greatly ashamed: and the king said, Tarry at Jericho until your beards be grown, and then return.

verses.text_plain: And when the children of Ammon saw that they stank before David, the children of Ammon sent and hired the Syrians of Beth–rehob, and the Syrians of Zoba, twenty thousand footmen, and of king Maacah a thousand men, and of Ish–tob twelve thousand men.
verses.verse_html:
6And when the children of Ammon saw that they stank before David, the children of Ammon sent and hired the Syrians of Beth–rehob, and the Syrians of Zoba, twenty thousand footmen, and of king Maacah a thousand men, and of Ish–tob twelve thousand men. ▼
▼ Ish–tob: or, the men of Tob

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Ish–tob: or, the men of Tob
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Ish–tob: or, the men of Tob

verses.text_plain: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
verses.verse_html: 7And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.

verses.text_plain: And the children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array at the entering in of the gate: and the Syrians of Zoba, and of Rehob, and Ish–tob, and Maacah, were by themselves in the field.
verses.verse_html: 8And the children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array at the entering in of the gate: and the Syrians of Zoba, and of Rehob, and Ish–tob, and Maacah, were by themselves in the field.

verses.text_plain: When Joab saw that the front of the battle was against him before and behind, he chose of all the choice men of Israel, and put them in array against the Syrians:
verses.verse_html: 9When Joab saw that the front of the battle was against him before and behind, he chose of all the choice men of Israel, and put them in array against the Syrians:

verses.text_plain: And the rest of the people he delivered into the hand of Abishai his brother, that he might put them in array against the children of Ammon.
verses.verse_html: 10And the rest of the people he delivered into the hand of Abishai his brother, that he might put them in array against the children of Ammon.

verses.text_plain: And he said, If the Syrians be too strong for me, then thou shalt help me: but if the children of Ammon be too strong for thee, then I will come and help thee.
verses.verse_html: 11And he said, If the Syrians be too strong for me, then thou shalt help me: but if the children of Ammon be too strong for thee, then I will come and help thee.

tokens.text: for me, then thou shalt help
for thee, then I will come

verses.text_plain: Be of good courage, and let us play the men for our people, and for the cities of our God: and the Lord do that which seemeth him good.
verses.verse_html: 12Be of good courage, and let us play the men for our people, and for the cities of our God: and the Lord do that which seemeth him good.

tokens.text: and let us play the men

verses.text_plain: And Joab drew nigh, and the people that were with him, unto the battle against the Syrians: and they fled before him.
verses.verse_html: 13And Joab drew nigh, and the people that were with him, unto the battle against the Syrians: and they fled before him.

verses.text_plain: And when the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians were fled, then fled they also before Abishai, and entered into the city. So Joab returned from the children of Ammon, and came to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 14And when the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians were fled, then fled they also before Abishai, and entered into the city. So Joab returned from the children of Ammon, and came to Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And when the Syrians saw that they were smitten before Israel, they gathered themselves together.
verses.verse_html: 15And when the Syrians saw that they were smitten before Israel, they gathered themselves together.

verses.text_plain: And Hadarezer sent, and brought out the Syrians that were beyond the river: and they came to Helam; and Shobach the captain of the host of Hadarezer went before them.
verses.verse_html:
16And Hadarezer sent, and brought out the Syrians that were beyond the river: and they came to Helam; and Shobach the captain of the host of Hadarezer went before them. ▼
▼ the river: that is, Euphrates
 , ▼
▼ Shobach: or, Shophach

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the river: that is, Euphrates

verses.text_plain: And when it was told David, he gathered all Israel together, and passed over Jordan, and came to Helam. And the Syrians set themselves in array against David, and fought with him.
verses.verse_html: 17And when it was told David, he gathered all Israel together, and passed over Jordan, and came to Helam. And the Syrians set themselves in array against David, and fought with him.

verses.text_plain: And the Syrians fled before Israel; and David slew the men of seven hundred chariots of the Syrians, and forty thousand horsemen, and smote Shobach the captain of their host, who died there.
verses.verse_html:
18And the Syrians fled before Israel; and David slew the men of seven hundred chariots of the Syrians, and forty thousand horsemen, and smote Shobach the captain of their host, who died there. ▼
▼ horsemen: also called, footmen

footnotes.body_html: ▼ horsemen: also called, footmen

verses.text_plain: And when all the kings that were servants to Hadarezer saw that they were smitten before Israel, they made peace with Israel, and served them. So the Syrians feared to help the children of Ammon any more.
verses.verse_html: 19And when all the kings that were servants to Hadarezer saw that they were smitten before Israel, they made peace with Israel, and served them. So the Syrians feared to help the children of Ammon any more.
